sentences.en: ...the immense variety of fonts available in Microsoft Word and Publisher.
sentences.cn: …微软的文字处理软件和排版软件中提供的种类繁多的字体。

sentences.en: Alternating the basic stroke set can change the type of font generated.
sentences.cn: 改变基本笔划库,可改变生成的字体种类.

sentences.en: Chinese font LCD Module User's Guide TBM 12864 - 12 , introduced in detail.
sentences.cn: 中文字库液晶显示模块使用手册TBM12864 -12, 介绍详细.

sentences.en: Even if the designer a font, but some people still make mistakes.
sentences.cn: 即使安排师传送了字体, 但有的人还是会犯不差.

sentences.en: Font viewer view sample text in all available fonts.
sentences.cn: 字体查看器样文在所有可用的字体.

sentences.en: He took the cover off the font, and put his white gloves in it.
sentences.cn: 他揭开圣水器的盖子, 把自己的白手套放了进去.

sentences.en: It changes the font configuration like size and color.
sentences.cn: 它改变了字体的配置一样大小和颜色.

sentences.en: Kanji characters cannot be inputted with the current font.
sentences.cn: 无法使用当前的字体来输入日文中的汉字字符.

sentences.en: Of course, go into a path may be slightly distorted complex font.
sentences.cn: 当然, 转成路径不定会惨重扭曲驳杂字体.

sentences.en: On the Font page, select the 12 pt font size.
sentences.cn: 在字体选项卡里选择12pt的字符大小.

sentences.en: Such a font would be ugly and just about unreadable.
sentences.cn: 这样的字体将是难看的和几乎不可读的.

sentences.en: This book is printed with a 10 - point font and 13 - point line spacing.
sentences.cn: 这本书是用10点字体和13点行间距打印的.

sentences.en: To change the font size, select view - text size - in your browsers menu.
sentences.cn: 你可以选择浏览器菜单中的“查看 — 字体大小”来改变字体尺寸.

sentences.en: To do this, you select some text and change the font color to white.
sentences.cn: 为了做到这点, 你选择一些文本并将字体的颜色改成白色.

sentences.en: TTF font file print bar code, and use the generic font file.
sentences.cn: TTF字体 文件打印条形码, 与搁置凡是的字体文件无异.

sentences.en: When you download the font it may be in a compressed format, such as a zip file.
sentences.cn: 下载的字体可能为压缩格式，如压缩文件包。

trans.tran_cn: 字体，字形，圣洗池（设于教堂中，常为石造），（同样字体和字号的）一副铅字
trans.tran_en: a set of letters of a particular size and style, used for printing books, newspapers etc or on a computer screen
